de.fu_berlin.maniac.auction_manager

Class MyAuctionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fu_berlin.maniac.auction_manager.MyAuctionManager

  • public final class MyAuctionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class manages your auctions. It provides the function to start a new Auction and to get all the bids for a certain transaction. You don't need to call getBidsByID() or getAuctions() by yourself, this will be done by the class Auction, which calls your selectWinner() function.
    Author:
    maniacchallenge

    • Method Detail

      • getAuctions

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<Bid>> getAuctions()
        Returns:
        The complete Hashtable with all bids from all transactions

      • getBidsByID

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bid> getBidsByID(int transID)
        Parameters:
        transID - The Transaction-ID of the auction
        Returns:
        Just the Bids for a certain Auction

      • handleAuction

        public void handleAuction(Advert adv,
                 Sender sender)
        Use this function to start a new Auction. You will need an Advert-Packet to start one.
        Parameters:
        adv - The new Advert-Packet you've created
        sender - The Sender-Class which will broadcast the new advert
